name: PUMP
description:
This was done for the Ludum Dare 45.

(I got a bit off theme)

Short game with only ~11 levels.

-CONTROLS-

Arrow keys to move

X to attack

--

I'm very happy with this project, I've always wanted to make something with enemies, so here's something with enemies.

I hope you all have a wonderful October and a Happy Halloweeeeeeen!

I used Stormy 6 Palette by https://twitter.com/Starbound64

Matt
